com.hazelcast.cache.impl.record

Interface CacheRecordMap<K extends Data,V extends CacheRecord>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - type of the key of CacheRecord to be stored
    V - type of the value of CacheRecord to be stored
    All Superinterfaces:
    EvictableStore<K,V>, Map<K,V>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SampleableCacheRecordMap<K,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheRecordHashMap

    public interface CacheRecordMap<K extends Data,V extends CacheRecord>
extends Map<K,V>, EvictableStore<K,V>
    Contract point for storing CacheRecords.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface java.util.Map

        Map.Entry<K,V>

    • Method Detail

      • setEntryCounting

        void setEntryCounting(boolean enable)
        Sets the entry counting behaviour. Because, records on backup partitions should not be counted.
        Parameters:
        enable - enables the entry counting behaviour if it is true, otherwise disables.

      • fetchKeys

        CacheKeyIterationResult fetchKeys(int nextTableIndex,
                                  int size)
        Fetches keys in bulk as specified size at most.
        Parameters:
        nextTableIndex - starting point for fetching
        size - maximum bulk size to fetch the keys
        Returns:
        the CacheKeyIterationResult instance contains fetched keys

      • fetchEntries

        CacheEntryIterationResult fetchEntries(int nextTableIndex,
                                       int size)
        Fetches entries in bulk as specified size at most.
        Parameters:
        nextTableIndex - starting point for fetching
        size - maximum bulk size to fetch the entries
        Returns:
        the CacheEntryIterationResult instance contains fetched keys
